channel.title: Hits of the Near Future (UK Unsigned)
channel.description: The best new UK unsigned and independent indie, electro, rock and cutting edge music, brought to you by Andy quirk.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Radio show and live nights in London
channel.itunes:author: Andy quirk
channel.itunes:summary: The best new UK unsigned and independent indie, electro, rock and cutting edge music, brought to you by Andy quirk.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future - Show 31
item.description: Andy (quirk) presents his monthly show of UK based new music, ranging from indiepop to electro rock and beyond. On this show there's news on Hits of the Near Future...Live! at The Workshop and new comedy and music night, Turn Off Your Television, at Camden Fiddler's Elbow. You will will hear: Vienna in Love, The Cat That Walks Alone, The Cellophane Flowers, Tree Pit, Fella, Tom Moriarty, The August September, The Stowaways, Dark Stares, Note To Self: Don't Die, Andy (quirk), Burning Shapes, These Reigning Days, Stillman and Miss Neutron Bomb.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy (quirk) presents his monthly show of UK based new music, ranging from indiepop to electro rock and beyond. On this show there's news on Hits of the Near Future...Live! at The Workshop and new comedy and music night, Turn Off Your Television, at Camden Fiddler's Elbow. You will will hear: Vienna in Love, The Cat That Walks Alone, The Cellophane Flowers, Tree Pit, Fella, Tom Moriarty, The August September, The Stowaways, Dark Stares, Note To Self: Don't Die, Andy (quirk), Burning Shapes, These Reigning Days, Stillman and Miss Neutron Bomb.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future 30
item.description: Andy quirk presents more new independent UK music in association with Recharged Radio. You will hear Fella, Limozine, Light Falls Forward, These Reigning Days, Stillman, Rebekah Delgado, Tree Pit, 50ft Woman, Painting Elephants, The Vinyl Junkies, Veronica, Kings of the City, Dollface, Dead Saints, To The Chase and Andy quirk.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents more new independent UK music in association with Recharged Radio. You will hear Fella, Limozine, Light Falls Forward, These Reigning Days, Stillman, Rebekah Delgado, Tree Pit, 50ft Woman, Painting Elephants, The Vinyl Junkies, Veronica, Kings of the City, Dollface, Dead Saints, To The Chase and Andy quirk.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future 29
item.description: Andy quirk presents the best new UK self released and unsigned music, plus news on Labyrinth Burlesque, Hits...Live! and an interview with Damn Vandals. You will hear The Fades, Lion Tops, Dollface, 50ft Woman, The Cullions, Painting Elephants, Andy quirk, To The Chase, Veronica, Kings of the City, and Damn Vandals.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents the best new UK self released and unsigned music, plus news on Labyrinth Burlesque, Hits...Live! and an interview with Damn Vandals. You will hear The Fades, Lion Tops, Dollface, 50ft Woman, The Cullions, Painting Elephants, Andy quirk, To The Chase, Veronica, Kings of the City, and Damn Vandals.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future 28
item.description: Andy quirk presents his top unsigned UK picks of the month once again. This time there's an interview with the Naked Polaroids as well as all the Labyrinth Burlesque and Hits of the Near Future...Live! news. You will hear: Meisha, Dead Saints, The Pretty Die Young, Damn Vandals, The Fighting Cocks, The Cullions, The Recusants, The Naked Polaroids, The ID, The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, Andy quirk, The Reigning Days and Monsters Build Mean Robots.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents his top unsigned UK picks of the month once again. This time there's an interview with the Naked Polaroids as well as all the Labyrinth Burlesque and Hits of the Near Future...Live! news. You will hear: Meisha, Dead Saints, The Pretty Die Young, Damn Vandals, The Fighting Cocks, The Cullions, The Recusants, The Naked Polaroids, The ID, The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, Andy quirk, The Reigning Days and Monsters Build Mean Robots.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future 27
item.description: Andy quirk presents more future hits from the independently released UK underground. Show 27 features an interview with Abigail from The Pretty Die Young plus there's also news on forthcoming live events. Within the hour you will hear Note To Self: Don't Die!, Rebel Territory, Model Society, Hysterical Injury, Damn Vandals, Adam and the Asbos, Andy quirk – Acoustic Adventurer, The ID, Showbizheroes, Fractures and The Unkindness of Ravens.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents more future hits from the independently released UK underground. Show 27 features an interview with Abigail from The Pretty Die Young plus there's also news on forthcoming live events. Within the hour you will hear Note To Self: Don't Die!, Rebel Territory, Model Society, Hysterical Injury, Damn Vandals, Adam and the Asbos, Andy quirk – Acoustic Adventurer, The ID, Showbizheroes, Fractures and The Unkindness of Ravens.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future 26
item.description: Andy quirk presents show 26 of Hits of the Near Future. This month I'm counting down my top 14 bands of the year...who will be No.1? You will hear, not in this order, the following indepedently released UK bands and artists: Be Like Pablo, The Little Philistines, Films of Colour, Bad Pollyanna, The Glass Child, The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, Keith TOTP, Patchwork Grace, Andy quirk, The Naked Polaroids, The Gaa Gaas, The Guilty Hands, The Vertigos, The Pretty Die Young and Rubicks.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents show 26 of Hits of the Near Future. This month I'm counting down my top 14 bands of the year...who will be No.1? You will hear, not in this order, the following indepedently released UK bands and artists: Be Like Pablo, The Little Philistines, Films of Colour, Bad Pollyanna, The Glass Child, The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, Keith TOTP, Patchwork Grace, Andy quirk, The Naked Polaroids, The Gaa Gaas, The Guilty Hands, The Vertigos, The Pretty Die Young and Rubicks.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future - Show 25
item.description: Hits of the Near Future with Andy quirk presents show 25 of the best new UK music. In this hour you'll hear an interview with Jim of The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, news on burlesque and bands night, Labyrinth, and music from the following future stars: The ID, The Words, Calling All Astronauts, Note To Self: Don't Die!, The Glass Child, Stonesthrow, Burning Shapes, Showbizheroes, The Naked Polaroids, Son of Eagle, The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, The Fantasies and Patchwork Grace.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Hits of the Near Future with Andy quirk presents show 25 of the best new UK music. In this hour you'll hear an interview with Jim of The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, news on burlesque and bands night, Labyrinth, and music from the following future stars: The ID, The Words, Calling All Astronauts, Note To Self: Don't Die!, The Glass Child, Stonesthrow, Burning Shapes, Showbizheroes, The Naked Polaroids, Son of Eagle, The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, The Fantasies and Patchwork Grace.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future 24
item.description: Andy quirk presents the best new independent and self released music from the UK. Celebrating its second birthday, Hits of the Near Future brings you electro, indie, rock and everything inbetween. There's also gig news and the usual chatter about Hits...LIVE! and Labyrinth Burlesque. You will hear: Showbizheroes, Son of Eagle, The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, Patchwork Grace, The Unkindness of Ravens, The Volitains, Peerless Pirates, Make Sparks, Keith Top of the Pops, Scams, Leisure, The Naked Polaroids, Dead Town Radio, Helmholtz Resonators, Scarlett Riot, Model Society and Andy quirk (ahem, that would be me.)
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents the best new independent and self released music from the UK. Celebrating its second birthday, Hits of the Near Future brings you electro, indie, rock and everything inbetween. There's also gig news and the usual chatter about Hits...LIVE! and Labyrinth Burlesque. You will hear: Showbizheroes, Son of Eagle, The Inevitable Pinhole Burns, Patchwork Grace, The Unkindness of Ravens, The Volitains, Peerless Pirates, Make Sparks, Keith Top of the Pops, Scams, Leisure, The Naked Polaroids, Dead Town Radio, Helmholtz Resonators, Scarlett Riot, Model Society and Andy quirk (ahem, that would be me.)

item.title: Hits of the Near Future 23
item.description: Andy quirk presents more of the best new electro, rock, indie and alternative from the UK. On this show there's news on Oxjam, Hits Live and Labyrinth. On the musical side of things you will hear Make Sparks, Damn Vandals, Volcanoes, Waylayers, The Fuegos, The Naked Polaroids,The Pretty Die Young, Blindness, Keith Top of the Pops, Peerless Pirates, The Gaa Gaas, Modern Squalor, Vienna and The Recusants.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents more of the best new electro, rock, indie and alternative from the UK. On this show there's news on Oxjam, Hits Live and Labyrinth. On the musical side of things you will hear Make Sparks, Damn Vandals, Volcanoes, Waylayers, The Fuegos, The Naked Polaroids,The Pretty Die Young, Blindness, Keith Top of the Pops, Peerless Pirates, The Gaa Gaas, Modern Squalor, Vienna and The Recusants.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future 22
item.description: Andy quirk presents the best new unsigned and self released music from the UK. Show 22 features tracks from Cross Wires, The Vertigos, The Naked Polaroids, Peerless Pirates, Be Like Pablo , The Recusants, HotBeds, The Fuegos, Coconi, Black Shades, Wobbly Bob, Rubicks, Alexa De Strange and the Sisters of Seduction and Keith Top Of The Pops And His All Star Minor Indie Celebrity Backing Band. Coconi and Black Shades also speak about their music in new feature, 3 Minute Hit, and there's all the usual news and chat about Hits...LIVE! and Labyrinth.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents the best new unsigned and self released music from the UK. Show 22 features tracks from Cross Wires, The Vertigos, The Naked Polaroids, Peerless Pirates, Be Like Pablo , The Recusants, HotBeds, The Fuegos, Coconi, Black Shades, Wobbly Bob, Rubicks, Alexa De Strange and the Sisters of Seduction and Keith Top Of The Pops And His All Star Minor Indie Celebrity Backing Band. Coconi and Black Shades also speak about their music in new feature, 3 Minute Hit, and there's all the usual news and chat about Hits...LIVE! and Labyrinth.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future - Episode 21
item.description: Hits of the Near Future 21, presented by Andy quirk, brings you the best new unsigned and self released music in the UK plus news, events and, in this episode, a bit of a rant on the demise of Myspace. You will hear: Exotica, Dead Town Radio, The Lucid Dream, Patchwork Grace, The Fuegos, Be Like Pablo, The Guilty Hands, The Little Philistines, Sabatta, The Soft Close-Ups, The Gaa Gaas, Skarlett Riot, Scams and Sister Suicide.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Hits of the Near Future 21, presented by Andy quirk, brings you the best new unsigned and self released music in the UK plus news, events and, in this episode, a bit of a rant on the demise of Myspace. You will hear: Exotica, Dead Town Radio, The Lucid Dream, Patchwork Grace, The Fuegos, Be Like Pablo, The Guilty Hands, The Little Philistines, Sabatta, The Soft Close-Ups, The Gaa Gaas, Skarlett Riot, Scams and Sister Suicide.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future - Episode 20
item.description: Andy quirk presents 14 more massive unsigned hits in the making from the best independently released rock, indie and electro talent in the UK. Episode 20 also includes news of future live nights from both Hits and Labyrinth, plus commentary on the "pop's too sexy" news stories that have recently done the rounds. You will hear: Scams, The Soft Close Ups, Skarlett Riot, Marthas & Arthurs, The Gaa Gaas, Cellophane Flowers, Bad Pollyanna, Blue Veils, Exotica, Among Brothers, The Horn, United Fruit, Model Village, and Alexa De Strange & The Sisters Of Seduction.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents 14 more massive unsigned hits in the making from the best independently released rock, indie and electro talent in the UK. Episode 20 also includes news of future live nights from both Hits and Labyrinth, plus commentary on the "pop's too sexy" news stories that have recently done the rounds. You will hear: Scams, The Soft Close Ups, Skarlett Riot, Marthas & Arthurs, The Gaa Gaas, Cellophane Flowers, Bad Pollyanna, Blue Veils, Exotica, Among Brothers, The Horn, United Fruit, Model Village, and Alexa De Strange & The Sisters Of Seduction.

item.title: Hits of the Near Future - Episode 19
item.description: Andy quirk presents the latest Hits of the Near Future, featuring news on the live shows at The Workshop on Old Street and Labyrinth Burlesque at Camden Fiddler's Elbow. You will hear: Bad Pollyanna, The Lightness Of Being, Plastic Millionaires, Bordeauxxx, Hot Vamp Club, The Vertigos, Films of Colour, The Troubled, Model Village, Love at Death Beach, Calling All Astronauts, Alexa De Strange and the Sisters of Seduction, My New Favourite Tribe, and The Recusants. All great new music from the UK!
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Andy quirk presents the latest Hits of the Near Future, featuring news on the live shows at The Workshop on Old Street and Labyrinth Burlesque at Camden Fiddler's Elbow. item.title: Hits of the Near Future - Episode 18
item.description: Hits of the Near Future presents more great new self released and unsigned UK music, presented by Andy quirk. Along with news of Hits of the Near Future live shows and the Labyrinth clubnight you will hear: United Fruit, The Recusants, Scams, The Guilty Hands, The Pretty Die Young, HotBeds, Films of Colour, Model Village, Motorcycle Display Team, Lotus Mason, The Violet May, History of the Trade, Public Speech and Alexa De Strange and the Sisters of Seduction.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
item.itunes:summary: Hits of the Near Future presents more great new self released and unsigned UK music, presented by Andy quirk. item.title: Hits of the Near Future 17
item.description: Episode 17 of Hits of the Near Future brings you the best new UK music, interspersed with the occasional ramblings of Andy quirk. This month there's news on some big forthcoming Hits events plus all the usual gig dates and music news. You will hear: Mechanical Cabaret, The Gaa Gaa's, 1914's, Wild Hope, History Of The Trade, Evi Vine, The Pretty Die Young, Attention Thieves, Kenelis, Bad Pollyanna, Subsource, The Guilty Hands, Hot Beds, Crooked Mountain, Crooked Sea and The Troubled.
item.dc:creator: Andy quirk
